channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (28 August 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-08-28/#comment-86">M. Maria</a>.
Apologies, I should've made it clearer. It's not a StudioPress theme, it's a free theme by Bradley Potter and can be downloaded via the following link:
https://github.com/bradpotter/amazing-times
item.content:encoded:
In reply to M. Maria.

Apologies, I should’ve made it clearer. It’s not a StudioPress theme, it’s a free theme by Bradley Potter and can be downloaded via the following link:

https://github.com/bradpotter/amazing-times

item.title: By: M. Maria
item.dc:creator: M. Maria
item.description: The Amazing Times is not at the Studiopress site. So is it available or still in development? thanks
item.content:encoded:
The Amazing Times is not at the Studiopress site. So is it available or still in development?
thanks
